title: Project Yi interactions
body:
Is Yi now officially the only champ to interact with himself in game? (if not pls enlighten me).

Because project yi can (either taunt or joke i don't remember) comment on how an enemy yi's goggles don't look right.

replies.body: I'm not sure but i think Trundle interacts with Traditional Trundle.
Yes. When base trundle ults Traditional Trundle, he says "Who does this guy think he is?"
Ah! ty both for the info... still kinda sad how you almost never see the skin nowadays though.

Hey Masked Lunatic,

PROJECT: Yi does have nteractions with other players in the game. For example, when Yi is ulting and dodges Fiora ult with (Q). He also has VO lines for purchasing various items, such as Infinity Edge and Stealth Wards.

Ooooh now i gotta try that one. I diligently listened to his new VO (because it's so awesome and has a rather sad feeling to it) funny thing is I tend not to hear most of his dialogue mid game because all I focus on is the awesome aa sounds (and all those pretty animations are just as distracting as watching a flame dance).
^-^ I'm personally a big fan of the Highlander particles. Have you noticed he has different processing in his VO depending on if he's in Highlander form or not?

Yeah though I am rather busy killing things at the time (i actually had to stop and listen). The echo on his voice is dramatic though.

I personally love combining the highlander particles with youmuu's active as it looks rather funky, not to mention Yi feels like a digital fireball waiting to eat you up.
